actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny the deduction of any expenditure of any oil company for advertising not directly related to the sale of products or services.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to disallow the deduction of oil company advertising expenses incurred for purposes other than the sale of products or services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to deny the deduction of any expenditure of any oil company for advertising not directly related to the sale of products or services.
